doc.after: The portrayal of nudes was officially discouraged in 17th century Spain Works could be seized or repainting demanded by the Inquisition and artists who painted licentious or immoral works were often excommunicated fined or banished from Spain for a year 30 However within intellectual and aristocratic circles the aims of art were believed to supersede questions of morality and there were many generally mythological nudes in private collections 5
